About the Company: Kwality Limited, formerly Kwality Dairy (India) Limited, is an Indian-based dairy products company. The Company is primarily engaged in the business of manufacturing, purchase and sale of ghee, skimmed milk powder, curd, whole milk powder, dairy lactose and milk. The other activities include pasteurizing and packing of fresh milk on job work basis and manufacturing of curd. The Companys product range include pure ghee, skimmed milk, instant dairy creamer, paneer, pasteurized table butter, sweet and flavoured milk, curd yogurt and dairy mix. The Company has four milk processing plants situated in Palwal, Saharanpur, Dibai, and Agra. The Company sells its products both domestically and export to home market and abroad.
